issue.title: [CF 682] Allow generic buff/debuff in conditions
issue.body:
For instance... I would like to add conditions to my warrior's normal rotational icons to not show when she's disarmed. However, I can only add conditions for each separate Disarm-type skill, not the Disarm "family" as it's possible to do on the Main tab.

Not sure if this is possible but it'd be nice.


> Posted by CurseForge user solitha | Imported from CurseForge issue #682 | Raw

comments.body:
This was the original purpose of the Icon Shown condition, long before the buff/debuff conditions existed at all. Create a separate icon to track Disarms and then reference it through an Icon Shown condition in your rotation icons/groups.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
